36 
38 //
39 // Base struct for tracking error bound with required ROS service conversions
40 // (to/from ROS service response of the appropriate type (SR)).
41 //
43 
44 #ifndef FASTRACK_BOUND_TRACKING_BOUND_ROS_H
45 #define FASTRACK_BOUND_TRACKING_BOUND_ROS_H
46 
47 #include <fastrack/utils/types.h>
48 #include <fastrack/bound/tracking_bound.h>
49 
50 #include <ros/ros.h>
51 #include <visualization_msgs/Marker.h>
52 
53 namespace fastrack {
54 namespace bound {
55 
56 template <typename SR>
57 struct TrackingBoundRos : public TrackingBound {
58  // Initialize from vector.
59  virtual bool Initialize(const std::vector<double>& params) = 0;
60 
61  // Convert from service response type SR.
62  virtual void FromRos(const SR& res) = 0;
63 
64  // Convert to service response type SR.
65  virtual SR ToRos() const = 0;
66 
67  // Returns true if this tracking error bound (at the given position) overlaps
68  // with different shapes.
69  virtual bool OverlapsSphere(const Vector3d& p, const Vector3d& center,
70  double radius) const = 0;
71  virtual bool OverlapsBox(const Vector3d& p, const Vector3d& lower,
72  const Vector3d& upper) const = 0;
73 
74  // Returns true if this tracking error bound (at the given position) is
75  // contained within a box.
76  virtual bool ContainedWithinBox(const Vector3d& p, const Vector3d& lower,
77  const Vector3d& upper) const = 0;
78 
79  // Visualize.
80  virtual void Visualize(const ros::Publisher& pub,
81  const std::string& frame) const = 0;
82 }; //\struct TrackingBoundRos
83 
84 } //\namespace bound
85 } //\namespace fastrack
86 
87 #endif
